document_data.name: Bearface Giltch
document_data.mainbody: '''Bearface Giltch''' was a member of the [[Rocktappers]] of the [[Earthfast Mountains]] in [[the Vast]] and [[Impiltur]], a band of prospectors and fur trappers who worked the mountains.{{cite book/The Bloodstone Lands|56}}
